mapper.insert: insert into tv_board (writer, tvid, title, like_hate, content, poster, tv_title, reg_date) values (#{writer}, #{tvid}, #{title}, #{likeHate}, #{content}, #{poster}, #{tvTitle}, #{regDate})
mapper.select: select b.tvb_id, b.title, writer, mod_at, read_count, poster, tv_title, reg_date, cmt_qty, u.nick_name, (select count(*) from tv_heart h where h.tvb_id = b.tvb_id) as heart from ( select tvb_id from tv_board order by tvb_id desc limit #{pageStart}, #{qty} ) a left join tv_board b on a.tvb_id = b.tvb_id left join user u on b.writer = u.email where like_hate = 1 order by tvb_id desc

select b.tvb_id, b.title, writer, mod_at, read_count, poster, tv_title, reg_date, cmt_qty, u.nick_name, (select count(*) from tv_heart h where h.tvb_id = b.tvb_id) as heart from ( select tvb_id from tv_board order by tvb_id desc limit #{pageStart}, #{qty} ) a left join tv_board b on a.tvb_id = b.tvb_id left join user u on b.writer = u.email where like_hate = 0 order by tvb_id desc
select tvb_id, title, writer, mod_at, content, poster, tv_title, reg_date, tvid, u.nick_name from tv_board t left join user u on t.writer = u.email where tvb_id = #{tvbId}
select count(tvb_id) from tv_board where like_hate = 1
select count(tvb_id) from tv_board where like_hate = 0
mapper.update: update tv_board set read_count = read_count + #{cnt} where tvb_id = #{tvbId}
update tv_board set cmt_qty = cmt_qty + #{cnt} where tvb_id = #{tvbId}
mapper.select: select count(mb_id) from m_board where tvid = #{tvid}
